ygData.subject: Re: Level 30,35,40,45, and a "power level" comme
ygData.msgSnippet: Dwarf in the sewers?  By the blood of Greyhawk! Was that you I saw with that pack of wererats following you? Been RP ing for 17 years. Ewwww. Am I geeked up or
ygData.messageBody:
Dwarf in the sewers? By the blood of Greyhawk! Was that you I saw with that
pack of wererats following you?
Been RP'ing for 17 years. Ewwww. Am I geeked up or what? Been playing since
the *Chainmail* days. For those of you who don't know what Chainmail is, its
those little light brown paper backs Gary Gygax (curse him) made pre-D&D
boxed sets.

Aci

-----Original Message-----
From: Roop Dirump <roop@...>
To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Thursday, July 15, 1999 6:29 PM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Level 30,35,40,45, and a "power level" comme


>From: "Roop Dirump" <roop@...>
>
>Heheh, when I was a teenager, and you mentioned roleplaying to an adult
they
>either thought it was something you did with your therapist or it meant you
>worshipped satan. Back then, nobody roleplayed but kids (Ya! I was one
who
>ran around in a sewer pretending to be a dwarf!), and the adults were the
>clueless kewldudes in their polyester leisure suits.
>
>Roop
>
>
>>From: "Naeeldar" <jackal@...>
>>
>>The problem with this is that it is another generalization granted there
>are
>>a lot of kewldudes, and a lot of them are teenagers but not all of them
>>there are some adults that fit into that category. The only problem with
